programme.title: Wanita Bertudung Hitam
programme.desc: Maya, gadis kampung bertukar menjadi seorang model terkenal di ibu kota, Kuala Lumpur. Dilimpahi kesenangan dan kekayaan, Maya menukar nama menjadi Tiara, seorang gadis yang glamor. Tertimpa kemalangan, dia mula menjadi murung dan melupakan kehidupan lamanya serta menukar kembali ke nama asalnya. Dia mula membaiki hubungannya dengan Tuhan dan mempelajari agama.

programme.title: Nadia
programme.desc: Nadia mengikut ayahnya yang baru bersara daripada menjadi pegawai kedutaan Malaysia di London pulang ke Malaysia. Namun ibunya enggan pulang dan masih tinggal di London. Nadia memulakan pengajiannya di ITM dan menjalin persahabatan dengan seorang pemuda bernama Izam. Apabila Nadia mendapati ayahnya mempunyai hubungan intim dengan seorang janda kaya, dia berikrar untuk mengambil ibunya kembali serta memulihkan hubungan keluarganya yang terputus itu.

programme.title: Ringgit Kassorga
programme.desc: Kekayaan, kemewahan dan hawa nafsu - semuanya boleh didapati di Pulau Kasorrga. Pulau khas buat warga elit ini menjadi tempat buat orang kaya untuk mencari ketenangan dan kepuasan. Pemilik syarikat permodelan dan pencari bakat, Meera Almeida membekalkan gadis ke pulau itu dan dibayar wang komisen yang tinggi. Namun rahsia gelap Pulau Kasorrga mula diungkai sedikit demi sedikit.

programme.title: Hati Bukan Kristal
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan yang bercita-cita tinggi, Nina, amat mengagumi dan menyukai hasil karya seorang wartawan dan editor bernama Cik Ida. Meskipun baru sahaja menceburi bidang kewartawanan di Harian Nasional namun sikapnya yang lain daripada yang lain telah mencuri perhatian ramai. Razief memandang rendah terhadap Nina namun perasaan kasih mula terdetik di hati. Michelle dengan kerjaya gelapnya terpaksa menghadapi pelbagai cabaran yang mendorongnya untuk melakukan tindakan drastik yang berbahaya.

programme.title: Driving School
programme.desc: Perasaan cemburu dan curiga menyebabkan Maimunah, isteri kepada Dato' Zaqlol mengambil kelas memandu di sekolah tempat suaminya mendaftarkan diri bersama perempuan simpanannya, Sally. Namun, terjadinya salah faham apabila Maimunah menganggap bahawa Faridah ialah perempuan simpanan suaminya. Hilmi, seorang guru memandu dan juga kekasih Faridah cuba digoda Maimunah.

programme.title: Abang 92
programme.desc: Kematian kedua ibu bapa yang tidak disangka, Imran harus memikul amanah mereka untuk menjaga adik-adiknya. Syarikat milik bapanya ingin dikuasai oleh pakcik-pakciknya yang menyeleweng wang milik syarikat, Imran yang tidak ingin perkara itu berlaku mula melakukan sesuatu. Seorang peguam jelita ditugaskan untuk membantunya - bermulalah kisah cinta di antara mereka berdua.

programme.title: Suci Dalam Debu
programme.desc: Roy, seorang anak kaya yang ingin berkawan dengan pemuzik bertemu Rina di sebuah kelab malam. Namun, Rina telah ditunangkan dengan Tengku Johan oleh bapanya, Tengku Aziz. Tengku Johan ingin mempercepatkan tarikh perkahwinan mereka kerana ingin memiliki Rina. Roy telah dicabar dan diletakkan taruhan oleh Tengku Johan jika benar dia boleh mendapatkan Rina.

programme.title: Nadia
programme.desc: Nadia mengikut ayahnya yang baru bersara daripada menjadi pegawai kedutaan Malaysia di London pulang ke Malaysia. Namun ibunya enggan pulang dan masih tinggal di London. Nadia memulakan pengajiannya di ITM dan menjalin persahabatan dengan seorang pemuda bernama Izam. Apabila Nadia mendapati ayahnya mempunyai hubungan intim dengan seorang janda kaya, dia berikrar untuk mengambil ibunya kembali serta memulihkan hubungan keluarganya yang terputus itu.

programme.title: Cinta Kita
programme.desc: Patah hati setelah dicurangi teman lelakinya, Remy, Latifah mengubah penampilannya menjadi seorang 'tomboy'. Sukar untuknya mempercayai lelaki, dia pun berpindah ke tempat lain. Perkenalannya bersama Arman, seorang penulis novel mengubah kembali cara Latifah yeng berpenampilan lelaki. Hubungan mereka yang semakin rapat menimbulkan perasaan cinta.

programme.title: Harry Boy
programme.desc: Kurang kasih sayang dan perhatian dari keluarga, Harry Boy mula menagih kasih di luar. Dia bertemu Julia dan mula terikut-ikut gaya hidup Julia yang bebas. Ini mendatangkan kerisauan terhadap ibu dan bapanya apabila dia mula tidak menghadiri kelas dan pulang ke rumah. Kemudian, dia bertemu pula dengan Haryati yang telah mengubahnya menjadi manusia yang lebih baik.

programme.title: Wanita Bertudung Hitam
programme.desc: Maya, gadis kampung bertukar menjadi seorang model terkenal di ibu kota, Kuala Lumpur. Dilimpahi kesenangan dan kekayaan, Maya menukar nama menjadi Tiara, seorang gadis yang glamor. Tertimpa kemalangan, dia mula menjadi murung dan melupakan kehidupan lamanya serta menukar kembali ke nama asalnya. Dia mula membaiki hubungannya dengan Tuhan dan mempelajari agama.

programme.title: Abang 92
programme.desc: Kematian kedua ibu bapa yang tidak disangka, Imran harus memikul amanah mereka untuk menjaga adik-adiknya. Syarikat milik bapanya ingin dikuasai oleh pakcik-pakciknya yang menyeleweng wang milik syarikat, Imran yang tidak ingin perkara itu berlaku mula melakukan sesuatu. Seorang peguam jelita ditugaskan untuk membantunya - bermulalah kisah cinta di antara mereka berdua.

programme.title: Ringgit Kassorga
programme.desc: Kekayaan, kemewahan dan hawa nafsu - semuanya boleh didapati di Pulau Kasorrga. Pulau khas buat warga elit ini menjadi tempat buat orang kaya untuk mencari ketenangan dan kepuasan. Pemilik syarikat permodelan dan pencari bakat, Meera Almeida membekalkan gadis ke pulau itu dan dibayar wang komisen yang tinggi. Namun rahsia gelap Pulau Kasorrga mula diungkai sedikit demi sedikit.

programme.title: Hati Bukan Kristal
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan yang bercita-cita tinggi, Nina, amat mengagumi dan menyukai hasil karya seorang wartawan dan editor bernama Cik Ida. Meskipun baru sahaja menceburi bidang kewartawanan di Harian Nasional namun sikapnya yang lain daripada yang lain telah mencuri perhatian ramai. Razief memandang rendah terhadap Nina namun perasaan kasih mula terdetik di hati. Michelle dengan kerjaya gelapnya terpaksa menghadapi pelbagai cabaran yang mendorongnya untuk melakukan tindakan drastik yang berbahaya.

programme.title: Driving School
programme.desc: Perasaan cemburu dan curiga menyebabkan Maimunah, isteri kepada Dato' Zaqlol mengambil kelas memandu di sekolah tempat suaminya mendaftarkan diri bersama perempuan simpanannya, Sally. Namun, terjadinya salah faham apabila Maimunah menganggap bahawa Faridah ialah perempuan simpanan suaminya. Hilmi, seorang guru memandu dan juga kekasih Faridah cuba digoda Maimunah.

programme.title: Perempuan, Isteri dan ....
programme.desc: Zaleha berkahwin lari ke Thailand bersama seorang lelaki lain menyebabkan bakal suaminya, Amir mula menjejakinya. Tragedi berlaku apabila Amir membunuh suami Zaleha dan menjualnya kepada seorang bapa ayam di Thailand. Diperdaya oleh Amir, mereka berdua akhirnya menikah - namun Zaleha mempunyai rancangan lain iaitu untuk membalas dendam atas apa yang telah dilakukan terhadapnya.

programme.title: Suci Dalam Debu
programme.desc: Roy, seorang anak kaya yang ingin berkawan dengan pemuzik bertemu Rina di sebuah kelab malam. Namun, Rina telah ditunangkan dengan Tengku Johan oleh bapanya, Tengku Aziz. Tengku Johan ingin mempercepatkan tarikh perkahwinan mereka kerana ingin memiliki Rina. Roy telah dicabar dan diletakkan taruhan oleh Tengku Johan jika benar dia boleh mendapatkan Rina.

programme.title: Amok
programme.desc: Amukan seorang lelaki yang dikejutkan dengan pertembungan budaya kebaratan yang mendorong anak Melayu berperwatakan liar. Wan Man, pelajar ilmu silat terperangkap dalam satu hubungan cinta bersama gadis Amerika, Natalie. Gadis liar yang mengamalkan gaya hidup bebas mula mempengaruhi rakan Wan Man. Segala ajaran Pak Guru terhadap Wan Man dan pusaka batin warisan bapanya mula menggangu perasaannya.

programme.title: Kasih Farrah
programme.desc: isu dendam oleh seorang lelaki dengan seorang wanita yang berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu, secara tidak sengaja lelaki itu pula bercinta dengan anak perempuan bekas kekasihnya sewaktu mereka berdua menuntut di luar negara.

programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Pinjaman Kepada Allah
programme.desc: Rahma ingin pulang bersama keluarganya. Firman cuba memenuhi kehendak isterinya. Tetapi Ihsan, anak mereka tidak mahu mengembara dengan kereta. Bertuah Firman mendapat bonus besar dan ingin membeli kereta untuk keluarganya. Namun kejadian demi kejadian terus berlaku dan membuatkan Firman tidak membeli kereta kerana wang itu digunakan untuk membantu orang ramai.

programme.title: Tmo Hanya Kau Yang Satu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Hanya Kau Yang Satu

programme.title: Cik Misi
programme.desc: Kisah Diana yang disuruh oleh ibunya untuk memilah kerjaya dalam bidang kejururawatan walaupun dirinya meminati untuk menjadi seoarang artis.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10

programme.title: Rengkat
programme.desc: Rais dan isterinya Yani hidup dalam serba sederhana. Mereka dikurniakan seorang anak iaitu Indah yang rengkat akibat daripda kemalangan semasa kecil. Suatu hari Rais diberhentikan kerja secara mengejut kerana dituduh menyebabkan kerugian kepada syarikat. Rais buntu memikirkan cara untuk mendapatkan duit untuk menampung keluarganya.

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie III
programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan Suzana di sebuah pangsapuri mewah yang dipercayai mempunyai kaitan dengan Ramon (Faizal Hussein). Ramon merupakan adik kepada Frankie. penjenayah yang ditumpaskan oleh Unit Gerak Khas dalam satu operasi menentang kumpulan militan dan sindiket pengedaran dadah 2 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Kao Krian
programme.desc: usaha seorang pemuda yang juga merupakan waris kepada sebuah bangunan hotel terbiar menghalau hantu yang telah menghuni bangunan tersebut. Beliau yang diupah oleh bakal pembeli dengan ganjaran yang lumayan, dibantu oleh beberapa individu dan bomoh telah mencuba pelbagai cara untuk menghalau hantu tersebut.

programme.title: Dm Hati Awak
programme.desc: Danial buntu memikirkan calon isteri yang memenuhi citarasa ibunya, Hanipah. Semuanya dengan alasan mereka tidak boleh menjaga Danial seperti yang diinginkannya.

programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar
programme.desc: Seorang gangster veteran, Dollah yang selalu bermimpi menjadi pelakon mendapat peluang seumur hidup apabila pelakon popular memintanya untuk menjadi mentornya untuk filem aksi. Seorang samseng di lokasi penggambaran, Dollah pasti menimbulkan pelbagai kekacauan.

programme.title: Konstable Mamat

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri bernazar di sebuah makam keramat dan akhirnya mendapat seorang anak perempuan. Setelah dewasa anak perempuan mereka menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan seorang jejaka dan mereka bercadang untuk berkahwin. Hasrat mereka terhalang apabila satu rahsia sejarah latarbelakang keluarga mereka terbongkar oleh si ayah jejaka berkenaan.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Ter Klomang Klomang Mengejar Cintamu
programme.desc: Terkadang jodoh memang tidak kemana-mana, Johan dan Indah adalah teman masa kecil yang terpisah namun akhirnya dapat bertemu di pelaminan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep180
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep34
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Kamera Cinta Ep8
programme.desc: Kamera Cinta adalah adaptasi format antarabangsa dari "Hear Me Love Me See Me", di mana seorang wanita bujang akan bertemujanji dengan 6 orang lelaki tanpa dapat melihat satu sama lain. Ketika bertemujanji, lelaki akan menggunakan kamera aksi di badan mereka dan wanita bujang dapat berkenalan dengan rakan, keluarga atau rakan sekerja mereka. Hanya seorang lelaki yang akan dipilih dan akan melangkah ke peringkat seterusnya.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep143
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep177
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Cewek Ugal Ugalan Nabrak Hati Rembo
programme.desc: Rania, gadis melulu yang suka menunggang motosikal, tetapi mengimpikan untuk menjadi wanita yang anggun, bolehkah ia berlaku?

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: Diva

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Killing Romance
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods

programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: Memory of China Ep123

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep256
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: Walking around China Ep107
programme.desc: It focuses on the latest changes in China from a humanistic perspective, pays attention to new phenomena, new fashions, and new things around ordinary Chinese people,

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep463
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep67
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep15
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep863864
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep687
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3388
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46984699
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep141142
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1845
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2085
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep961
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the others parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Kos first love!

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughters company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xus life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: It's a fact: the greatest martial arts movie character is Huang Fei-hung. But it's quite possible the second greatest character is "Beggar Su", one of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers, and a legendary Ching Dynasty figure. Little known director Liu Shih-yu decided to fill his telling of the character's life story with the best kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer. He reunited the stars of Liu Chia-liang's landmark Dirty Ho -- Gordon Liu Chia-hui, Wang Yu, and Wang Lung-wei--added such other greats as multi-award-winning Ku Feng and Pai Piao, then gave workhorse Lo Chiang his shot as choreographer. Together they made a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. Finally, after much death and destruction, Gordon Liu Chia-hui and Wang Lung-wei get a memorable rematch to follow their classic masterpieces in Dirty Ho and Martial Club. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liang's work, but essentially an homage to him as well!

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: The Lady is the Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Journey of the Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Jien Chiu and Bai Yu Tong are equally matched rivals in martial arts. Bai saves the emperor one day but did not believe his identity. Jien rescues the emperor later and gets promoted to the royal guard. This angers Bai and he attempts to jeopardize Jiens position by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Jien is able to reclaim the seal with his skills.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Come Drink with Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar Drunken Cat who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kongs entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wongs disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex S5 Ep16
programme.desc: Due North - Rex seeks help from Detective Sidney Scott to save his stranded and injured friends.

programme.title: FBI: International S2 Ep20
programme.desc: A Tradition Of Secrets - After a cybersecurity expert robs one of Switzerland's largest and most secretive banks, the Fly Team is called to track down the fugitive. Also, Smitty's loyalty is put to the test.

programme.title: Rookie Blue S5 Ep9
programme.desc: Moving Day - 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, Moving Day, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex thats being torn down.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Lost & Found - Joel encounters the ghost of a man who committed suicide in his cabin 40 years ago; Maurice is visited by his former commanding officer.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep09
programme.desc: Snappier Judgement - Klinger is tried for the theft of the Polaroid camera, and enlists Charles as his representation in court against the advice of Hawkeye and B.J. The camera was a gift from a father to the duo, who saved the life of his son. Charles completely bungles Klingers defense and Hawkeye and B.J. must plan a clever trap to catch the real thief and free their friend. The two doctor-detectives even go so far as to get a Polaroid of the guilty man, taken with the stolen camera, of course.

programme.title: Shogun S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Part 4 - A British sea captain becomes an honored Samurai after being shipwrecked in 17th century Japan. An epic mini-series that is a blend of politics, romance, history, culture, religion and high adventure.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep17
programme.desc: My Mother / My Sister - Shelly's visiting mother attempts to pass Shelly off as her older sister; Adam experiences symptoms of sympathetic pregnancy for Eve.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Wake Up Call - Maggie meets an enigmatic stranger; Marilyn's cousin, a healer, observes Joel to learn about conventional medicine; Shelly begins shedding her skin.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep10
programme.desc: 'Twas the Day After Christmas - Some visiting British soldiers give Col. Potter an idea for how to cheer up the 4077th after an especially dreary Christmas. It seems there is an age-old tradition in England for officers and enlisted men to trade places for one day on the day after Christmas. The 4077th tries the switch and both sides learn about each others difficulties, especially Klinger, who ends up in command.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep11
programme.desc: Burned - The Sennet couple will stop at nothing to get custody of their daughter Tessa. Stabler and Benson have to sort through the lies that ends up leaving one of the parents in a grave medical state.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep08
programme.desc: Uncle Bertram - Mother Jefferson is upset over an encounter with an elevator masher, who turns out to be Tom Willis' elderly Uncle Bertram, a retired firefighter in town to visit his relatives.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Tiger by the Tail - A kidnap hoax and publicity stunt by a young rock 'n' roll singer who decides his career needs a publicity boost backfires when his father offers a huge reward for his return.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep06
programme.desc: Endora Moves in for a Spell - Uncle Arthur pops out of a painting in the Stephens home. Samantha tells him she is trying to stop Endora from encouraging Tabitha to use her witchcraft.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep06
programme.desc: The Crucible - Frasier is furious when he learns that his newest art purchase is actually a fake.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep12
programme.desc: Outsider - Fin reluctantly works with a Brooklyn detective who thinks that Fin's rape cases are connected to his unsolved murder cases.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep09
programme.desc: George Won't Talk - George is excited about being invited to speak in front of some youths about his success at what he believes is a college--until he discovers that he's to speak in the Harlem neighborhood where they used to live.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep17
programme.desc: Second Time Around - Sam tries to help Frasier out of a severe depression by fixing him up with "a girl who can show him a good time." After just one date with Candi, Frasier announces his plans to marry her immediately.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Final Frontier - Holling (John Cullum) must confront unresolved feelings when his old nemesis, Jesse the bear, is found dead; an influx of Japanese tourists annoys Maurice (Barry Corbin). With Doug Ballard and Don R. McManus.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep20
programme.desc: It Happened In Juneau - Joel and Maggie (Rob Morrow, Janine Turner) are forced to share a hotel room when she flies him to Juneau for a medical conference; Chris' (John Corbett) brother (Richard Cummings Jr.) returns from Africa.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep11
programme.desc: Follies of the Living--Concerns of the Dead - Klinger develops a severe fever of indeterminable origin which baffles the doctors of the 4077th. Even more odd is Klingers fevered ramblings where he seems to be communicating with the spirit of a dead soldier. As time goes by it is revealed that he is communicating with the spirit of Pvt. Weston, a dead soldier who has been lingering at the 4077th trying to discern if he is dead. While Weston shares what he feels are the trivial concerns of the living, Klinger is written off as crazy for his communications into the unknown. It seems that what Weston needed most was someone to listen to him; he eventually allows his spirit to move on with the other souls lost in the war.

programme.desc: Twitch or Treat - Darrin is incensed when Endora makes a house appear near the Stephens home for a Halloween party. When Samantha begs her mother to remove the house, Endora decides to hold her party in the Stephens home.

programme.desc: Cicely - Through flashbacks, a 108-year-old former resident (Roberts Blossom) recalls the history of Cicely, founded in 1909 by two women (Yvonne Suhor, Jo Anderson) who envisioned a Utopian community. With Janine Turner.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep12
programme.desc: Birthday Girls, The - A pregnant cow with a shrapnel injury is brought into the M*A*S*H unit by her owner for her delivery. Hot Lips celebrates her birthday by going to Tokyo for a date with a General. In Hot Lips absence, Charles instructs the nurses on proper use of a drug, which he does in exchange for a classical record. When complications arise for the pregnant cow, Levophed, a new drug, makes the delivery possible. Charles, being the authority on the use of the drug, must demonstrate on the cow while the nurses watch; he is less than thrilled about the operation. Klingers jeep breaks down and Hot Lips is unable to get to the airport for her birthday trip. Klinger later starts a betting pool on the birth of the calf.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep5
programme.desc: Yep, This Is The World We Live In - The effects of the supply chain shortages continue to impact the E.D. when Vanessas drug dealer reappears.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Mamma Said There Would Be Days Like This - Crockett adjusts to his newfound fame when he helps Will treat a local restaurant owner.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep8
programme.desc: A Fire in the Ashes - Magnum starts following Higgins to discover what shes been hiding, as shes secretly assigned to infiltrate a group threatening to take down MI-6.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Better Watch Out - A Christmas Eve ransomware attack on the Honolulu Police Department forces Lia to reveal a family secret to Magnum and Katsumoto.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep9
programme.desc: He Made Me Do It / New York Nights / The Passenger - A call devolves into ghostly encounter between a Guard and a spirit. Paramedic Malcolm gets called to a decrepit apartment building. Trisha is left dumbfounded when her ambulances lighting system goes on the fritz.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep10
programme.desc: Demon Teen / Dark Shadows / Paranormal Plaza - A father calls 911 about his daughters weird behavior. Officer Scott is called to an attempted robbery, and finds an elderly man being tormented. The Police receive a call that there is a bomb left in a mall.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep11
programme.desc: Whispers In The Dark / Board At Work - Security Guard John Griffin is called to an emergency alarm in a hospital building where he encounters unexplained phenomena. Firefighter Jake Parsons unknowingly summons a spirit via Ouija board.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep5
programme.desc: Jack-Tor - Jack (Alec Baldwin) aspires to act and Tracy (Tracy Morgan) reveals a painful secret.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep9
programme.desc: Higher Education - NCIS investigates the death of a college student who was killed while running across the street and had connections to McGees wife, Delilah (Margo Harshman).

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep10
programme.desc: Too Many Cooks - NCIS agents from Washington, D.C., L.A. and Hawaii, all in D.C. to attend the retirement party of a beloved Federal Law Enforcement Training Center (FLETC) professor, find themselves investigating his shocking suicide.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep11
programme.desc: Bridges - Parker discovers hes a victim of identity theft while investigating the unusual murder of a Navy ensign. Also, Knight and Jimmy face hurdles in their relationship as their connection heightens.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep12
programme.desc: Big Rig - When an old pal of Torres comes to him disheveled and bloodied for guidance amidst an undercover FBI operation and then disappears, NCIS helps track him down. Also, McGee prepares to be a contestant on a popular game show.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep13
programme.desc: Evil Eye - A world-renowned actress (played by Lost vet Tania Raymonde) shadows the team as they investigate a decapitation case.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep14
programme.desc: Old Wounds - Parker grapples with his emotions when a conman from his past turns up as a prime suspect in the murder of a navy officer transporting millions of dollars worth of opioids.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep15
programme.desc: Unusual Suspects - NCIS investigates the death of a ride-share driver who was found after a car accident. Also, Parkers dad, who is temporarily living with him, assists the team in their investigation, on the 450th episode of the CBS Original series NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep16
programme.desc: Butterfly Effect - The NCIS team jumps into motion to investigate who is responsible for a potential bio terror attack at a strip mall parking garage. Also, Knights father deals with a health scare while in Japan.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep8
programme.desc: A Fire in the Ashes - Magnum starts following Higgins to discover what shes been hiding, as shes secretly assigned to infiltrate a group threatening to take down MI-6.

programme.desc: Better Watch Out - A Christmas Eve ransomware attack on the Honolulu Police Department forces Lia to reveal a family secret to Magnum and Katsumoto.

programme.title: TMZ No BS - Hollywood's Biggest Lies
programme.desc: The lies that led to some of the biggest stories in Hollywood history, from the rise of Kim Kardashian to the fall of Jussie Smollett.

programme.title: TMZ No BS - Britney Spears: Divorce & Despair
programme.desc: The lies that led to some of the biggest stories in Hollywood history are exposed by TMZ.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep6
programme.desc: Jack Meets Dennis - Liz Lemon goes back to her ex-boyfriend Dennis, (guest star Dean Winters) simply because she's bored.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep2
programme.desc: 6 more disguised celebrities take to the stage, Pearly King, Onomatopoeia, Pig, Sea Slug, Cactus, and Tomato Sauce. Panellists Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Peter Crouch and Oti Mabuse try to work out who is behind the mask.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep3
programme.desc: 5 of the remaining disguised celebrities return to the stage. 2 of the masked performers will have to compete in a dance-off with 1 surviving with their identity still hidden and the loser being unmasked.

programme.title: Secrets Of A Gold Digger Killer
programme.desc: When Celeste Beards multimillionaire husband was killed by her delusional and disturbed friend Tracey, Celeste was certain she would never be blamed. But Celestes twin daughters discovered the truth and works to bring her to justice.

programme.title: Accused Ep7
programme.desc: Brenda's Story - When an acerbic female stand-up comic reports she was sexually assaulted at her friend's party, the DA decides her highly questionable past, and reputation obfuscates a conviction and drops all charges against the suspect. Enraged, the comedian uses her platform to try the case in the court of public opinion.

programme.title: Accused Ep8
programme.desc: Laura's Story - A grieving mother learns that facts and evidence are no match for viral misinformation when she discovers a growing online conspiracy that denies the reality that her son died in a mass shooting. When she engages with the online trolls to set the record straight, she becomes consumed by an endless crusade that tears her family apart.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep1
programme.desc: What's in Your Food? - This episode features a selection of stories that take one some well-known food-related myths, looks at food that are deeply embedded in culture, and unravels the science behind some frequently asked questions about food.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Inside Your Body - This episode reveals how different parts of our body are constantly and silently at work all the time and capable of amazing things. The stories highlight this superior machine in all its glory by featuring the science behind some everyday habits and events.

programme.title: Primates S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Protecting Primates - Today, more than half of the world's primates are under threat of extinction. Meet the scientists making groundbreaking discoveries about this remarkable animal family.

programme.desc: Robson and TV presenter Steph McGovern explore beach foraging and kite-buggying in Northumberland, on their mission to find new things to do in the great outdoors.

programme.desc: Scotland's Lost Worlds - Ben journeys from Stroma, inhabited 1,000 years ago, to Swona, its first inhabitants being the Vikings and then to the towering prehistoric cliffs of St Kilda, the most remote of Scotland's Lost Worlds.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Robson and TV presenter Steph McGovern explore beach foraging and kite-buggying in Northumberland, on their mission to find new things to do in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Race Across the World S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The five pairs leave Dawson City and head south to the third checkpoint, the Rocky Mountain resort town of Banff. This time, the team arriving in last place will be eliminated from the race.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep1
programme.desc: What's in Your Food? - This episode features a selection of stories that take one some well-known food-related myths, looks at food that are deeply embedded in culture, and unravels the science behind some frequently asked questions about food.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Inside Your Body - This episode reveals how different parts of our body are constantly and silently at work all the time and capable of amazing things. The stories highlight this superior machine in all its glory by featuring the science behind some everyday habits and events.

programme.title: Primates S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Protecting Primates - Today, more than half of the world's primates are under threat of extinction. Meet the scientists making groundbreaking discoveries about this remarkable animal family.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Lost Worlds S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Scotland's Lost Worlds - Ben journeys from Stroma, inhabited 1,000 years ago, to Swona, its first inhabitants being the Vikings and then to the towering prehistoric cliffs of St Kilda, the most remote of Scotland's Lost Worlds.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: It's Not Just You - This episode handpicks a bunch of experiences that are common to human beings, no matter what age, lifestyle or cultural background they come from. It makes a great case to prove that - you are not the only one and there are others just like you.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Science of Sport - This episode features the million questions we tend to ask ourselves every time we watch an excellent game of sport, bringing the science behind sporting action.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Humans - Humans are changing our planet so rapidly, it's affecting earth's life support systems: our weather, our oceans and the living world.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Japan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Joanna's journey begins in the sub-zero temperatures of Hokkaido - Japan's wild north. Known for its rugged terrain, it is home to some of Japan's most endangered wild animals.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Commander - Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Congo to investigate a potentially lethal threat to over two-million people. After a recent eruption, a huge 10-mile-long fracture has appeared in the ground. It runs directly from the slopes of Nyiragongo volcano down to lake Kivu.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep18
programme.desc: Young Guns - Jessie Holmes heads to the high country on the quest for food. Ricko DeWilde takes his children out on the open waters for a vital lesson in bush survival.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Operation Pelican - Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island - Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life and Death in the Dunes - The Arabian Desert is one of the most challenging places on earth, but the animals here are resilient and specialized. Even for the hardiest inhabitants, deaths never far away. Creatures must seize every opportunity to find food, shelter and water. Adaptability is the key to dune survival.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Wonders of the Wadi - A wadi is a waterhole, a rare place in the desert where hard bedrock traps the tiniest traces of water. A vital valley visited by the creepy and bizarre. All animals must come here to drink, something predators are quick to exploit; venomous vipers, glowing scorpions and stalking tarantulas hide in the crevices, ever ready to strike.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bush Camps - Eco-tourism isn't just a background player in the operation of Ol Pejeta, it's the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ultra-luxurious accommodation, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature during their stay and they even assist in research and tracking park wildlife.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep4
programme.desc: A Sloth Bear's Dilemma - In a land of searing summer heat and thunderous tropical storms, life for all that live on the plains of southern India is tough. But this year its harder than ever as the monsoon rains are late to arrive. For Bibi, a female sloth bear with two young cubs, this will be the biggest challenge of her life. With no rainfall, food will be hard to find and her cubs are also open to attack from leopards and other bears. Bibi must guide her family through this tricky time. Does she have the experience for them all to survive?

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Woodland Troop - In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbors are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid. They will suffer loss, and gain friends, as they discover what it means to be part of the Woodland Troop.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Girls of Oryx Plain - A baby rhino's mother is illegally shot and Ol Pejeta staff have to calm the wild baby. It's not ideal to separate the calf from her mother, but the situation is dire, and the calf will have to be hand-raised. Also, a look at a four-year-old captive rhino that went through the same thing and is now entering a new stage in life.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Critical Plains - While the Ol Pejeta staff help move a herd of hartebeest to another park, an ailing eland is spotted. Suffering from a wound from an illegal trap, the massive antelope will have to be tranquilized and treated before it's too late. After the eland is dealt with, a baby hartebeest will need to be herded back with her main group of antelope.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Surrogate Families - Most baby animals have a mother to raise them and show them how to succeed in the wild. Mammals are particularly dependent on their moms. In this episode of Baby Animals well meet four different species of babies that are being raised by humans and who have surrogate families.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rana: Queen of the Jungle - One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, we follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs. She must provide enough food for her family to stay alive.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Better Together - The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island - Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. Its an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life and Death in the Dunes - The Arabian Desert is one of the most challenging places on earth, but the animals here are resilient and specialized. programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Simien Mountains - Simien Mountains National Park in Ethiopia is home to some of the rarest creatures on earth. Take a glimpse into life on some of the highest peaks in Africa, in the last stronghold of shaggy, grass-grazing Geladas, elusive Simien wolves and horned Walia ibex.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Herd Mentality - Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Endangered Species - With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart; two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Safari CSI - Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Brisbane Raid - Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sea of Serpents - Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Chobe National Park: Land of Learning - In the north of Botswana there is a haven where the Chobe River provides a lifeline for wildlife, but in the dry season many animals face a daily battle with the fierce heat, Including three of Africas most iconic families: lions, elephants and baboons. Though they may be vastly different, they all have the same goal: to raise their young.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.desc: Meet Fort Morgan - The Napiers and the Marrs kick off the revitalisation of Fort Morgan, Colorado, with the goal to transform 18 projects in just four months.

programme.desc: Twins Win In Winslow - Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb kickstart Winslow, Arizona, by turning a beloved root beer and chili stand into a welcoming space for locals and tourists alike.

programme.title: Rock The Block S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Exterior Showdown - With budgets dwindling and pressure rising, the teams head outside to design their outdoor spaces.

programme.desc: Speaking My Language in Spain - A Navy man fulfills his dream of moving his family, including his mother-in-law, to Rota, Spain.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home S3 Ep11
programme.desc: With Neighbors This Good - A couple that lived abroad returned home seven years ago to raise their kids in the perfect neighborhood.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation S17 Ep10
programme.desc: A Groovy Kind Of Reno - A family is ready to leave their apartment and are looking for a new home. They want a property with character but dont want to spend too much money.

programme.desc: Finale Showdown - The teams race to finish their houses before their money runs out and judgement day arrives.

programme.desc: Creative In San Miguel De Allende - A stressed out Los Angeles couple hopes to find more relaxation in San Miguel de Allende, Mexico.

programme.title: Perfect Home: Asia S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Hong Kong From Sydney - Brent has been transferred to Hong Kong and, despite her concerns, his girlfriend Natalie is committed to moving with him.

programme.desc: Welcome Party - The Marrs hope to bring out the fun side of Fort Morgan by revamping the local bowling alley while Ben and Erin create a unique gathering space.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Movein Ready - A couple's dream of being parents came true when they had their girls, but they've delayed moving to their new home because it needs a complete overhaul.

programme.desc: Upstate Update In Cornwall - Nate Berkus and Jeremiah Brent get creative in Cornwall, New York. They dress up a beloved Main Street boutique and create a fun gathering space.
